title: Oodumay
description: Destiny was the law created by the gods to maintain order upon the earth. Through no fault of his own Vihark became a riddle that the gods were unable to solve until now. Given the task of finding an orange eyed man, Vihark now known by some as the Crimson Wind must decide the fate of a complete stranger for what ever choice he makes will decide where he will spend the rest of eternity.
author: Shane Porteous
